about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: We can make it together
about.description: With experience in engineering projects, I bring valuable skills to software development. My expertise in analysis, project management, and system design translates into web development, where I create high-performing solutions. I stay up-to-date with technological advancements to ensure high-quality and scalable applications.

exp_revampr.desc: Lead the design and development of user interfaces using Angular and PrimeNG. Implementing backend services with Spring Boot and collaborating in an Agile (SCRUM) environment.

exp_digizone.desc: Developed technical solutions and REST APIs using Laravel and Angular. Managed the full development lifecycle and UI/UX design in an Agile team.

exp1.desc: Developed a transport management web application using Symfony 6. Handled functional analysis, persistence ORM, and CI/CD workflows.

exp2.desc: Created interactive e-commerce and fitness platforms using Angular. Focused on technical analysis, UI prototyping, and API integration.

exp3.desc: Led hydraulic and hydrological studies as a team leader. Managed stakeholder communication and project organization.

edu1.desc: National Engineer in Hydraulics and Development at Medjez-lbeb Higher School of Engineers.
